title: Tiktok Ads Specialist
job_overview:
Position Overview:
We’re hiring a Paid Media Specialist VA to manage advertising across TikTok (Ads and TikTok Shop) as well as Pinterest, Snapchat, and X/Twitter. This role is not about starting from scratch, it’s about bringing tight daily execution, quality control, and creative coordination to a set of platforms where the brand already has presence and performance data.

You’ll work closely with the internal creative team to deploy assets into campaigns, manage platform-level nuances, catch potential issues before they go live, and compile ongoing reports on performance across each channel.

Key Responsibilities:

TikTok Advertising and TikTok Shop Campaigns
Set up, monitor, and optimize TikTok Ads for both traffic and conversion
Run TikTok Shop Ads, ensuring accurate setup, catalog connections, and promo timing
Flag and troubleshoot any platform issues or attribution inconsistencies between the two

Secondary Channel Management (Pinterest, Snapchat, X/Twitter)
Launch and maintain retargeting and prospecting campaigns across each secondary platform
Ensure campaign structures, creative placements, and targeting settings are configured correctly
Watch for platform-specific glitches such as feed syncing, creative rendering, or policy flags

Creative Coordination and QA
Work closely with the internal content and design team to receive and implement ad assets
Double-check that creatives match placements, copy is accurate, and links are functioning
Maintain a high bar for campaign hygiene including naming conventions, delivery previews, and scheduling

Performance Monitoring and Reporting
Pull and summarize platform-specific reports each week with key campaign metrics
Alert internal stakeholders of any unusual performance swings or technical breakdowns
Assist in light performance tracking of creative variations, spend efficiency, and ROI indicators

Qualifications (Must-Have):
Proven experience managing significant paid media budgets 
Direct experience working with ecommerce brands, preferably in clothing, lifestyle, or wellness
Strong hands-on experience managing TikTok Ads and TikTok Shop Ads
Experience with Pinterest Ads, Snapchat Ads, and X/Twitter campaigns
Familiarity with how each platform handles campaign delivery, attribution, and data
High attention to detail, confident catching setup errors, rendering bugs, or audience mismatches
Excellent English communication, able to coordinate clearly with creative and marketing teams
Reliable, self-managed, and comfortable working asynchronously in a fast-paced environment

Nice to Have:
Experience compiling paid media dashboards or integrating platform reporting
Awareness of creative best practices and performance drivers for each ad type
Experience working within CPG, wellness, or lifestyle ecommerce brands
